angle_summary: Example Cafe has no website and no Google Business listing — there is no online pathway for potential customers to find, evaluate, or contact the business. The opportunity is a combined new website and Google Business setup that creates immediate local search visibility and a direct contact route from scratch.
proof_points: No website found — the business has no online presence and cannot be found through local search
No Google Business listing identified — the business does not appear in Google Maps or local search results
No contact, booking, or enquiry pathway exists online — potential customers have no way to act on local awareness
offer_scope_points: Build a new mobile-first website covering menu or offering, opening hours, location with map, and contact details with click-to-call
Set up and verify a Google Business Profile with accurate business information, category, and location
Add a contact enquiry form and assess whether a table booking or reservation feature suits the cafe's service model
personalisation_notes: No website or Google Business listing found — this is the clearest possible signal for a new website build offer and the most direct outreach hook available
Source is local knowledge and physical visit — this makes the outreach feel genuinely researched rather than scraped, and gives permission to reference the cafe by name with confidence
suggested_cta: Would you have 15 minutes this week for a quick call — I can walk you through what a simple website and Google listing would involve and what it would cost?
avoid_saying: Anything implying the business is failing or invisible because they have no website — frame it as an untapped opportunity, not a critical gap that should embarrass the owner
Referencing technical details like PageSpeed, SSL, or platform — none of these are relevant at this stage and would make the outreach feel impersonal and scripted
unknowns_to_confirm: Does the business have any existing social media presence that could be referenced in outreach or linked from the new website
Is the cafe walk-in only or would a booking or reservation system be relevant — this shapes the scope and cost of the project
